snippet.title: [SMBX-38A] The Legend of Darkness Newest Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the newest teaser trailer for The Legend of Darkness, a SMBX-38A project of Hel Studio.
The Legend of Darkness is a SMBX-38A episode made by Hel studio,  whose members are mostly from China.
This project of this episode was originally launched by me in summer 2015, and this episode has only been finished the former 2 chapters before. Because I was busy after starting high school in summer 2017, and members in the studio also had their own affairs to deal with, the progress of this project was very slow. During this time, Slash-18 updated many stuffs in this episode.
Last year, because we're dissatisfied with the levels we made years ago, we decided that we would make levels of this episode from scratch. And in the last summer, we released the first trailer of this project. However, because I was prepared to take part in the entrance exams for postgraduate schools, and there's a lack of manpower in the team, there was no big update of this project since the first trailer's release. And this year I will study hard to prepare to the entrance exams for postgraduate schools, so there may be not many news about this project in this year. In this case, I made this new trailer to show something we were working on to you.
Most of playable levels in the first chapter of this project has been finished so far. However, because we lack GFX designers, there's still many works remaining to be done. And because the previous version of world map is too complex for World 1, we finally decided to remake a more simple and concise one, as shown in this trailer. As for demo…… If there's no other people who's willing to take over the work in this team, probably no demo playable this year. But what if……? In one word, if you're interested in this project, you can join this Discord server to work with us together: https://discord.gg/DwCgAKa7HQ

Feature:
The Legend of Darkness is a SMBX-38A episode with a lot of unique features. In this episode, player will explore 8 different chapters, meet with various characters with different personalities, experience many new mechanisms, watch vivid and energetic cutscenes, and the most importantly... play interesting levels!

Story:
The Power of Darkness sealed long time ago has been broken. A mysterious man claiming 'Mr.Dark' obtained this power, seeming to intend to use this power for dominating the world. To stop his evil deeds, Mario and Luigi have to start on an adventure again. A legend has it that only Stars of Brightness can be used to save the world from falling into the darkness. On their way to collecting Stars of Brightness to save the world, the Mario Bros will experience various uncertainties, and some unexpected people may join in their party to go on the adventure with them together. How will their adventure go on, what's the fate of this world later, and what's deal with that mysterious 'Mr.Dark'? Play this episode to find the answer!

Discord:
If you're interested in this project, join this Discord server and keep up the newest progress of the project on time!
https://discord.gg/DwCgAKa7HQ

For details, you can visit: https://www.smbxgame.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=90&t=28260
https://wohlsoft.ru/forum/viewtopic.php?f=62&t=4560
